law.catch_line: Prepayment of fines subject to certain conditions.

text.section:
All offenses classified as violations under this chapter shall be prepayable except for:
An offense where evidence of the commission of the offense, or of another offense, or a deadly weapon or dangerous instrument as defined in KRS 500.080 is seized and the citation is so marked and a court date set;
An offense is cited with another offense that is not prepayable and the citation is so marked and a court date set; or
An arrest is made under KRS 431.015.
In the event that a prepayable offense is cited with another offense that is not prepayable, a court appearance shall be required on all of the offenses as required by KRS 431.452.

law.history: Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 512, sec. 1, effective July 14, 2000.
